text: James Peter Edward Shaw (born 6 May 1973) is a New Zealand politician. He is the leader of the Green Party of Aotearoa New Zealand. In October 2017 he became the Minister outside Cabinet for Statistics and Climate Change Issues. Following Metiria Turei's resignation in August 2017, Shaw became the Green Party's only leader for the 2017 general election. ==References== Category:1973 births Category:Living people Category:Politicians from Wellington Category:Green Party of Aotearoa New Zealand politicians
title: James Shaw
